mapper.insert: INSERT INTO footballMatching.team(name, user_idx, location_code, information, registrationDate) VALUES (#{name}, #{representative}, #{locationCode}, #{information}, #{registrationDate});
mapper.select: SELECT a.name, b.name as representative, a.location_code as locationCode, a.information, a.registrationDate, a.modifiedDate FROM footballMatching.team as a LEFT JOIN footballMatching.user as b ON a.user_idx = b.idx WHERE b.id = #{id};
